code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     System.setProperty("propPath", "org/apache/camel/component/properties").     PropertiesComponent pc = context.getComponent("properties", PropertiesComponent.class).     pc.setLocation("classpath:${propPath}/${propFile}").     return context. }
@Override @After public void tearDown() throws Exception {     super.tearDown().     System.clearProperty("propPath"). }
